objects.text:
• Handcrafted Bohemian Design
• Premium Leather Construction
• Comfortable Padded Insole
• Durable Rubber Outsole

product_details.name: Artisan Comfort: Boho-Chic Designer Sneaker with Handcrafted Details
product_details.description:
• Unique bohemian-inspired design with decorative scalloped patterns
• Premium beige and tan leather construction with artisanal stitching
• Comfortable padded insole with light blue interior lining
• Durable rubber outsole with distinctive bubble texture
• Stylish brown contrast laces for adjustable fit
• Hand-detailed ornamental elements on toe and heel
• Lightweight and flexible construction for all-day wear
• Perfect blend of casual comfort and artistic expression
• Available in unique earth-tone color combination
• Ideal for fashion-forward individuals seeking distinctive footwear

banner_details:
The banner has a modern, earthy aesthetic divided into four color-blocked quadrants with flowing curves and circular accents, reflecting a handcrafted vibe. The top-left quadrant includes bold and elegant heading (id: "heading") and subheading (id: "subheading") aligned to the left. The bottom-left features a bullet-point product description (id: "description"), a prominently displayed price (id: "price"), and a dark brown rounded call-to-action button with white text (ids: "cta_background" and "cta"). The right half visually balances the left text with a central image of a sneaker (id: "product_image") in warm tones. A sleek promotional tag (id: "tagline") is positioned below the product image.

**Color Palette**:
- Light Cream (#FDF5E6)
- Warm Beige (#E6C7A5)
- Muted Terracotta (#D6A77D)
- Rich Brick (#B86F4D)
- Deep Brown (#5D3A1D)
- Highlight White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image showcases a creatively styled shoe that primarily uses a warm, earthy color palette. Dominant tones include creamy beige (#F5D6A0), burnt sienna (#C75A1E), caramel brown (#B87333), peach beige (#FFD6A3), and hints of soft ivory white (#FFF2E1). These colors are harmoniously blended to create a handcrafted, artisanal look while subtly emphasizing different materials and textures. Laces and detailing in deeper oranges and reddish-browns add contrast and depth, which are highlighted by soft lighting and smooth gradients. For an advertisement banner, this warm palette evokes feelings of comfort, durability, and aesthetic craftsmanship, perfect for a heritage-style promotion.
